title: IPL fever boosts bar and pub business amid sweltering heatwave
description: As the Indian Premier League (IPL) playoffs commence, bars, pubs, and cafes are capitalizing on the surge in fan interest. The ongoing heatwave is driving cricket enthusiasts to seek air-conditioned comfort in these establishments rather than enduring the sweltering stadiums. Businesses are offering live screenings, stadium-like atmospheres, sports menus, cocktails, and team merchandise. Despite alcohol-free dry days during elections in Mumbai and Delhi-Gurgaon, establishments expect strong turnout, emphasizing the social experience.
